Type.Name: WindowStateEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WindowStateEventHandler(object o, WindowStateEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed WindowStateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the WindowStateEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the WindowStateEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the WindowStateEventHandler is removed from the event.
